about:
***MCZone and Avicus Veteran*** Hey guys! This is Duckboy, I've been with this server since MCZone. I love playing nebula and the walls with my friends. I hope to some day become a staff member on this server! I'm a really fun guy to be with, so hopefully we can play a game of Nebula together on Avicus!! Also, if you have ANY questions about MCZone or Avicus or just any question in general no matter what I'll do my best to answer them!:D "I'm the best duck there ever was...."-Duckboy2112 *First person with the name "Duckboy2112"* Leaderboard: Daily: have been 1st Weekly: have been 1st All time: have been 1st (before prestige) Kill Achievements: •1,000 kill: seaborn718 •2,000 kill: Kensa10 •3,000 kill AR_Rocks •4,000 kill exemptyeti266 •5,000 kill FlyingMonkey003 •6,000 kill TorchoTichy •7,000 kill MengatzAMV *8,000 kill beatsboy324 Nebula Achievements: -Broken every monument on a map -Taken all of the other teams iron and thrown it into the void xD -Got a golden apple kill (knocked opponent off edge) -Got a bow kill off of a 360 spin (Used to snipe in black ops :D) -80 kill streak on Luar (Lime Team) (not spawn killing) -90 kill streak on Zalidor (Purple Team) (not spawn killing) -Built a functional rollar coaster to other team'a base (Senex) -Mined 10 monuments in a row by myself (Venomous, Broken World, Fanstasy, Senex) -Killed 2 people with a bow while falling into the void (lucky right!? xD) -Made and ate a god apple on every map possible -Have killed every mod on the server (Sr.,Jr.,and Mod) My last Mod kill was izjust4fun -Been named the MVP of a match by team (Nebula, Senex) Most kills, and Mined both obbis •1st Prestige 2/22/14
